text:
Blockport | Amsterdam | Full-Time | https://blockport.io

Blockport aims to bridge the gap between the traditional financial system and the upcoming cryptocurrency world by developing a social, hybrid decentralised cryptocurrency exchange.

To learn more about us and our engineering culture: https://jobs.blockport.io

Our open roles are:

Frontend developer: https://jobs.blockport.io/o/frontend-developer-amsterdam

QA Engineer: https://jobs.blockport.io/o/senior-qa-engineer

Lead Security Engineer: https://jobs.blockport.io/o/lead-security-engineer
